WORLD EATERS DAEMON model only. Each time a model in the bearer's unit makes an attack, a Critical Hit is scored on an unmodified Hit roll of 5+, instead of only a 6.
INFANTRY OFFICER model only. Enemy units cannot use the Fire Overwatch Stratagem to shoot at the bearer's unit.
INFANTRY OFFICER model only. Add 2 to the Attacks characteristics of the bearer's Pistols.
OFFICER model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, when that unit is issued an Order, it is also affected by the Take Cover! Order.

INFANTRY OFFICER model only. If you control an objective marker at the end of your Command phase, and the bearer's unit (or any TRANSPORT it is embarked within) is within range of that objective marker, that objective marker remains under you control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

ASTRA MILITARUM TECH-PRIEST ENGINSEER model only. At the start of your Shooting phase, select one TRANSPORT from your army (excluding AIRCRAFT and TITANIC units) within 3" of the bearer. Until the end of the phase, each time that TRANSPORT makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

INFANTRY OFFICER model only. The bearer's unit can disembark from a TRANSPORT after it has Advanced. If it does, it counts as having made a Normal move that phase, and cannot declare a charge in the same turn, but can otherwise act normally in the remainder of the turn.
VEHICLE OFFICER model only. Once per turn, after the bearer issues an Order to a SQUADRON unit from your army, it can issue the same Order to another SQUADRON unit from your army.
VEHICLE OFFICER model only. The bearer has the Feel No Pain 6+ ability.
VEHICLE OFFICER model only. Add 3 to the bearer's Objective Control characteristic.
INFANTRY OFFICER model only. The bearer's unit has the Benefit of Cover and the Stealth ability while the bearer's unit is wholly within 3" of one or more friendly TRANSPORT models.
VEHICLE OFFICER model only. Each time a model in the bearer's unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY model only. Once per battle, at the start of any phase, the bearer can use this Enhancement. If it does, select one enemy unit within 8" of the bearer's unit (excluding MONSTER and VEHICLE units); that unit must take a Battle-shock test.

INFANTRY OFFICER model only. After both players have deployed their armies, if the bearer is on the battlefield, select up to three other ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY units from your army and redeploy them. When doing so, you can set those units up in Strategic Reserves if you wish, regardless of how many units are already in Strategic Reserves.
ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY model only. The bearer has the Scouts 6" ability.

ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY model only. Each time an enemy INFANTRY or MOUNTED unit ends a Normal, Advance, Charge or Fall Back move within 9" of the bearer's unit, roll one D6: on a 4+, until the start of your next turn, that enemy unit is stunned. While a unit is stunned, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
INFANTRY OFFICER model only. While the bearer is leading a REGIMENT unit, that unit has the Scouts 6" ability.

WORLD EATERS DAEMON model only. The bearer's Deadly Demise ability inflicts mortal wounds on a D6 roll of 2+ instead of on a 6. In addition, the bearer has the Deadly Demise D3+1 ability, instead of the Deadly Demise D3 ability.

MILITARUM TEMPESTUS OFFICER model only. The bearer's unit can be set up using the Deep Strike ability in the Reinforcements step of your first, second or third Movement phase, regardless of any mission rules.
MILITARUM TEMPESTUS OFFICER model only. Enemy units cannot use the Fire Overwatch Stratagem to shoot at the bearer's unit.

MILITARUM TEMPESTUS OFFICER model only. Each time the bearer issues an Order, if the bearer's unit contains one or more models equipped with a master vox, it can issue that Order to up to three different REGIMENT units, instead of only one.

T'AU EMPIRE model only. Select one plasma rifle equipped by the bearer. Improve the Strength characteristic of that weapon by 2, and improve the Attacks, Armour Penetration and Damage characteristics of that weapon by 1.

INFANTRY OFFICER model only. After both players have deployed their armies, select up to three REGIMENT units from your army and redeploy them. When doing so, you can set those units up in Strategic Reserves, regardless of how many units are already in Strategic Reserves.

ADEPTUS CUSTODES INFANTRY model only. The first time the bearer is destroyed, roll one D6 at the end of the phase. On a 2+, set the bearer back up on the battlefield, as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, with its full wounds remaining.
ADEPTUS CUSTODES model only. The bearer has the Lone Operative and Stealth abilities.

SHIELD‐CAPTAIN model only. At the start of the Fight phase, until the end of the phase, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by the bearer for every 5 enemy models within 6" of the bearer (rounding down).
SHIELD‐CAPTAIN model only. Improve the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by the bearer by 3, and improve the Armour Penetration and Damage characteristics of those weapons by 1.
WORLD EATERS model only. If the bearer's unit disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn, until the end of the turn, enemy units cannot use the Fire Overwatch Stratagem to shoot at the bearer's unit.
ORKS model only. Ranged weapons equipped by models in the bearer's unit have the RAPID FIRE 1 ability.
ORKS model only. Each time a model in the bearer's unit makes a ranged attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.
ORKS model only. The bearer's unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

T'AU EMPIRE model only. Select one T'au flamer equipped by the bearer. Improve the Strength characteristic of that weapon by 2, and improve the Armour Penetration and Damage characteristics of that weapon by 1.

T'AU EMPIRE model only. Select one fusion blaster equipped by the bearer. Improve the Attacks characteristic of that weapon by 1, improve the Strength characteristic of that weapon by 3, and that weapon has the MELTA 4 ability
SHADOW LEGION model only. Models in the bearer's unit have the Scouts 9” ability.

T'AU EMPIRE model only. Select one airbursting fragmentation projector equipped by the bearer. Improve the Strength characteristic of that weapon by 3, and improve the Armour Penetration and Damage characteristics of that weapon by 1.
SHADOW LEGION model only. While an enemy unit is within Engagement Range of the bearer's unit, subtract 1 from the Objective Control characteristic of models in that enemy unit.

SHADOW LEGION model only. At the end of the Fight phase, if the bearer's unit destroyed one or more enemy units this phase and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, you can remove the bearer's unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

SHADOW LEGION model only. At the start of the Fight phase, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of the bearer's unit and roll one D6: on a 2‐5, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds.
ORKS model only. Ranged weapons equipped by the bearer have the DEVASTATING WOUNDS and HAZARDOUS abilities.
EMPEROR'S CHILDREN model only. Add 1 to the Attacks and Damage characteristics of melee weapons equipped by the bearer.

EMPEROR'S CHILDREN model only. Each time a model in the bearer's unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit below its Starting Strength, add 1 to the Hit roll. If that target is also Below Half-strength, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

EMPEROR'S CHILDREN model only. Each time a melee attack targets the bearer's unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of that unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

EMPEROR'S CHILDREN model only. After both players have deployed their armies, select up to two EMPEROR'S CHILDREN units from your army and redeploy them. When doing so, you can set those units up in Strategic Reserves if you wish, regardless of how many units are already in Strategic Reserves.

EMPEROR'S CHILDREN model only. Each time a model in the bearer's unit makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, it can move through enemy models. When doing so, it can move within Engagement Range of such models but cannot end that move within Engagement Range of them, and any Desperate Escape test is automatically passed.

EMPEROR'S CHILDREN model only. You can target the bearer's unit with the Heroic Intervention Stratagem for 0CP, and can do so even if you have already targeted a different unit with that Stratagem this phase.

EMPEROR'S CHILDREN model only. Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, the bearer can use this Enhancement. If it does, until the end of the phase, models in the bearer's unit have the Fights First ability.

EMPEROR'S CHILDREN INFANTRY model only. Once per battle, at the end of the Fight phase, if the bearer is within Engagement Range of three or more enemy models, it can use this Enhancement. If it does, the bearer can fight one additional time. When doing so, you can select one ability using the Exquisite Swordsmanship Detachment rule to apply to those attacks.
WORLD EATERS model only. In the Declare Battle Formations step, if the bearer starts the battle embarked within a DEDICATED TRANSPORT, that DEDICATED TRANSPORT has the Scouts 9" ability.

EMPEROR'S CHILDREN INFANTRY model only. Once per turn, in your Movement phase, the bearer can use this Enhancement. If it does, select one friendly EMPEROR'S CHILDREN TRANSPORT that is in Strategic Reserves. Until the end of the phase, for the purposes of setting up that TRANSPORT on the battlefield, treat the current battle round number as being one higher than it actually is.

EMPEROR'S CHILDREN INFANTRY model only. Each time the bearer disembarks from a TRANSPORT, until the end of the turn, you can re-roll Charge rolls made for the bearer's unit and enemy units cannot use the Fire Overwatch Stratagem to shoot at the bearer's unit.

EMPEROR'S CHILDREN INFANTRY model only. Once per turn, in your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot, you can select one friendly EMPEROR'S CHILDREN unit within 9" of the bearer that was hit by one or more of those attacks, then select one friendly TRANSPORT that unit is wholly within 6" of and is able to embark within. That EMPEROR'S CHILDREN unit can embark within that TRANSPORT.

EMPEROR'S CHILDREN INFANTRY model only. Once per battle round, when a saving throw is failed for a friendly EMPEROR'S CHILDREN VEHICLE model within 6" of the bearer, you can change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 0.
EMPEROR'S CHILDREN model only. Once per battle round, you can target one friendly SLAANESH unit within 6" of the bearer with the Heroic Intervention Stratagem for 0CP.

EMPEROR'S CHILDREN INFANTRY model only. Once per battle, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets, the bearer can use this Enhancement. If it does, until the end of the phase, the bearer has a 3+ invulnerable save.

EMPEROR'S CHILDREN or KEEPER OF SECRETS model only. Each time the bearer's unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in that unit. Each time a model in the bearer's unit makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, it can move through enemy models. When doing so, it can move within Engagement Range of such models but cannot end that move within Engagement Range of them, and any Desperate Escape test is automatically passed.

EMPEROR'S CHILDREN model only. The first time the bearer is destroyed, take a Leadership test for the bearer at the end of the phase. If that test is passed, set the bearer back up on the battlefield, as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, with D6 wounds remaining (up to its Wounds characteristic).
EMPEROR'S CHILDREN model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, improve the Leadership and Objective Control characteristics of models in that unit by 1.

EMPEROR'S CHILDREN model only. At the start of your Shooting phase, select one enemy unit within 12" of and visible to the bearer. That unit must take a Leadership test, subtracting 2 from the result if it is Battle-shocked: if failed, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds.

EMPEROR'S CHILDREN model only. Once per turn, just after making a Hit roll, a Wound roll or a saving throw for a model in the bearer's unit, if the bearer is not Battle-shocked, it can use this Enhancement. If it does, treat the result as an unmodified roll of 6 instead.

EMPEROR'S CHILDREN model only. You can re-roll Charge rolls made for the bearer's unit. While the bearer's unit is your army's Favoured Champions, add 2" to the Move characteristic of models in that unit.

WORLD EATERS model only. At the start of your Shooting phase, you can select one VEHICLE model within 6" of the bearer or, if the bearer is embarked within a TRANSPORT, you can select that TRANSPORT model. Until the end of the phase, after the selected model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next turn, that enemy unit is suppressed. While a unit is suppressed, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

EMPEROR'S CHILDREN model only. At the start of the battle, select one melee weapon equipped by the bearer; add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that weapon. In addition, each time the bearer is selected to fight, it can use this Enhancement. If it does, while resolving those attacks, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of that weapon and that weapon has the DEVASTATING WOUNDS and HAZARDOUS abilities.

EMPEROR'S CHILDREN model only. Each time an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) within Engagement Range of the bearer's unit Falls Back, models in that enemy unit must take Desperate Escape tests. When doing so, if the bearer's unit is your army's Favoured Champions, subtract 1 from each of those Desperate Escape tests.

EMPEROR'S CHILDREN model only. The bearer's melee weapons have the PRECISION ability, and each time the bearer makes a melee attack that targets a CHARACTER unit, improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of that attack by 1.
WORLD EATERS model only. Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, the bearer can use this Enhancement. If it does, until the end of the phase, the bearer's unit has the Fights First ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One KABAL unit from your army and one enemy unit that is Below Half-strength.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: GREY KNIGHTS PSYKER unit from your army that either Advanced this turn or arrived using the Deep Strike or Teleport Assault abilities this turn.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the ASSAULT ability and each time a model in your unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Select either the LETHAL HITS or SUSTAINED HITS 1 ability. Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected ability, but models in your unit can only target PSYKER units with their attacks.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY REGIMENT unit from your army (excluding ARTILLERY and CHARACTER units) is destroyed.
stratagems.targetBody: That INFANTRY unit. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: Roll one D6: on a 3+, place one Cult Ambush marker anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy units (if this is not possible, no marker is placed) and add a new unit to your army identical to your destroyed unit, in Cult Ambush, at its Starting Strength, with all of its wounds remaining and any ONE SHOT weapons those models are equipped with considered as not having been shot.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Reinforcements step of your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit is set up on the battlefield from Reserves.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASTRA MILITARUM or GENESTEALER CULTS unit from your army (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) within 12" of that enemy unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One TYRANIDS MONSTER unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effectBody:
Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, it can move through models (excluding TITANIC models) and sections of terrain features that are 4" or less in height. When doing so:

• It can move within Engagement Range of enemy models, but cannot end that move within Engagement Range of them.
• It can also move through sections of terrain features that are more than 4" in height, but if it does, after its unit has moved, roll one D6: on a 1, your unit is Battle-shocked.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES WALKER model from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the start of your next Command phase, improve your model's Move, Toughness, Leadership and Objective Control characteristics by 1 and each time your model makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One GENESTEALER CULTS unit from your army that is arriving using the Deep Strike ability this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units.
stratagems.restrictionBody: A unit targeted by this Stratagem is not eligible to declare a charge in the same turn.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Charge phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY or HERETIC ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced. If you select one or more units within range of an objective marker as a target of that charge, add 1 to the Charge roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One DAMNED unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can make a Desperate Pact. If it does, until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll, and if your unit did not fail the resulting Leadership test when making that Desperate Pact, you can re-roll the Wound roll as well.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase, just after a DEATH COMPANY unit from your army Advances.
stratagems.targetBody: That DEATH COMPANY unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced. If your unit is within 12" of one or more friendly CHAPLAIN models, or it is below its Starting Strength, until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEAGUES OF VOTANN unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, that attack has the SUSTAINED HITS 1 ability, and each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that has one or more Judgement tokens, that attack has the SUSTAINED HITS 2 ability instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase, just after an enemy model with the Deadly Demise ability (excluding TITANIC models) is destroyed.
stratagems.targetBody: One HERETIC ASTARTES CHARACTER unit from your army that was within 18" of that enemy model when it was destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: Your opponent does not roll to determine whether mortal wounds are inflicted by their model's Deadly Demise ability. Instead, mortal wounds are automatically inflicted (if that ability inflicts a random number of mortal wounds, your opponent rolls to determine that number as normal).

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One WORLD EATERS unit from your army that was just destroyed while it was within range of one or more objective markers you controlled at the end of the previous phase. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one of those objective markers. That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent's Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR, BLADEGUARD VETERAN SQUAD, STERNGUARD VETERAN SQUAD or VANGUARD VETERAN SQUAD unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. If your unit is Below Half-strength, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the IGNORES COVER ability. If your unit is under the effects of the Devastator Doctrine, until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of such weapons by 1 as well.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS model from your army that was just destroyed and that is eligible to fight but has not been selected to fight this phase. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: Before rolling to see if this model deals any mortal wounds as a result of its Deadly Demise ability, it can fight; when doing so, it is assumed to have 1 wound remaining, or all its wounds remaining if your army is Honoured. After it has finished resolving its attacks, resolve its Deadly Demise ability as normal.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You cannot target SIR HEKHTUR with this Stratagem.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase, just after a SPEED FREEKS or TRUKK unit from your army ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.targetBody: That SPEED FREEKS or TRUKK unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one enemy unit within 9" of your unit. That enemy unit must take a Battle‑shock test and, when doing so, subtract 1 from the result.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Charge phase, just after a SPEED FREEKS unit from your army ends a Charge move.
stratagems.targetBody: That SPEED FREEKS unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ORKS WALKER unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Each time you use this Stratagem, you can choose to push it. Until the end of the phase, add 2 to the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit and, if you chose to push it, until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of those weapons and they have the HAZARDOUS ability as well.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Charge phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One BOYZ unit from your army that has not declared a charge this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit declares a charge, add 1 to the Charge roll and, if your unit contains 10 or more models, you can re-roll the Charge roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One DAMNED unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can make a Desperate Pact. If it does, until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1, and if your unit did not fail the resulting Leadership test when making that Desperate Pact, improve the Strength characteristic of that attack by 1 as well.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just before an ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army Piles In.
stratagems.targetBody: That ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile‑in move, it can move up to D3+3" instead of up to 3".

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, that attack has the LETHAL HITS ability, and the IGNORES COVER ability as well if the Divination Discipline is active for your army.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One T'AU EMPIRE unit (excluding KROOT units) from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the battle, each time a T'AU EMPIRE unit (excluding KROOT units) from your army makes an attack that targets the enemy unit that just destroyed your unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Charge phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ACOLYTE HYBRIDS, HYBRID METAMORPHS or NEOPHYTE HYBRIDS unit from your army that has not declared a charge this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back. When doing so, if it targets an enemy unit within Engagement Range of one or more friendly CHARACTER units, you can re-roll the Charge roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase, just after your focus of hatred is destroyed.
stratagems.targetBody: One HERETIC ASTARTES CHARACTER unit from your army (excluding Damned units).
stratagems.effectBody: Select one enemy unit within 12" of and visible to your unit. Until the start of your next Command phase, that enemy unit is considered to be your focus of hatred.

stratagems.whenBody: End of the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that was eligible to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: If your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6" or up to 12" if it is a MOUNTED unit. Otherwise, your unit can make a Fall Back move. It cannot embark within a TRANSPORT at the end of this move if it disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One BOYZ unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Return up to D3+2 destroyed models to your unit (excluding CHARACTER models).

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One RAVENWING MOUNTED unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets an INFANTRY CHARACTER or MOUNTED CHARACTER unit, add 1 to the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Charge phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that is within your army's Shadow of Chaos.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that is within 9" of the enemy unit that just ended that move.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", or a Normal move of up to 6" instead if it is under the effects of the Tactical Doctrine.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.targetBody: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY or HERETIC ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One NECRONS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit. In addition, if a NECRONS CHARACTER is leading your unit, until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1 (this is not cumulative with any other modifiers that improve Armour Penetration).

stratagems.whenBody: Start of your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ORKS INFANTRY unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, add 2 to Advance and Charge rolls made for your unit.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase, just before an ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army that is within Synapse Range of your army makes a Surge move.
stratagems.targetBody: That ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit
stratagems.effectBody: When making that Surge move, you can re-roll the D6 to determine how far your unit moves, and your unit can end that move as close as possible to the closest objective marker (instead of as close as possible to the closest enemy unit). All other rules for making Surge moves still apply.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES CHARACTER unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one Templar Vow that is not active for your army. Until the start of your next Command phase, while that CHARACTER is leading a unit, models in that unit gain the benefits of that vow in addition to the vow selected to be active for your army at the start of the battle.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Charge phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One BEAST SNAGGA unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back. In addition, you can re-roll Charge rolls made for your unit, provided one of the targets of that charge is your Prey.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase, just after an ORKS VEHICLE unit from your army with the Deadly Demise ability is destroyed.
stratagems.targetBody: That destroyed ORKS VEHICLE unit, if you rolled a 6 for its Deadly Demise ability. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can make a Normal or Fall Back move before its Deadly Demise ability is resolved, and before any embarked units perform an Emergency Disembarkation. When making this move, your unit can move over enemy units (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) as if they were not there.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase, just after a mortal wound is allocated to an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army.
stratagems.targetBody: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after a HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army destroys a CHARACTER unit.
stratagems.targetBody: That HERETIC ASTARTES unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Each enemy unit within 12" of and visible to your unit must take a Battle-shock test.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One T'AU EMPIRE unit from your army that has just been selected as an Observer unit (see For the Greater Good).
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets their Spotted unit, improve the Ballistic Skill characteristic of that attack by 1 and, if your unit has the Markerlight keyword, that attack has the IGNORES COVER ability.

stratagems.whenBody: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: Up to two SICARIAN units from your army, or one SKITARII INFANTRY or SKITARII MOUNTED unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Remove those units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves.
stratagems.restrictionBody: Each unit targeted with this Stratagem must be more than 3" away from all enemy units.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One DEATHWING INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If your unit is within range of your Vowed objective marker, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase, just after an enemy unit fails a Battle-shock test.
stratagems.targetBody: One CHAOS KNIGHTS unit from your army that is within 12" of that enemy unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Roll six D6. For each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound and this model regains up to 1 lost wound.

stratagems.whenBody: Start of any phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ARCHON, one SUCCUBUS and one HAEMONCULUS from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Discard one Pain token from your Pain token pool. Until the end of the phase, all three of those models' units are Empowered.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You can only use this Stratagem if you are able to select all three of the target models stated above.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS CUSTODES VEHICLE unit from your army Advances.
stratagems.targetBody: That ADEPTUS CUSTODES VEHICLE unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Advanced. If your unit has the WALKER keyword, until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the IGNORES COVER ability, and until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that attack's Ballistic Skill characteristic and/or any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: Up to two TYRANIDS units from your army that are within Synapse Range of your army and are eligible to fight, or one other TYRANIDS unit from your army that is eligible to fight.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in any of those selected units makes an attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
stratagems.targetBody: One NECRONS unit from your army that had one or more of its models destroyed as a result of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit activates its Reanimation Protocols and reanimates D3 wounds (or D3+1 wounds if a NECRONS CHARACTER is leading your unit).

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One T'AU EMPIRE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase. The first time you use this Stratagem, you must also select one objective marker that is not in your opponent's deployment zone; until the end of the battle, this becomes your Trap objective marker.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit within range of your Trap objective marker, add 1 to the Wound roll.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You cannot use this Stratagem during the first or second battle rounds.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One HARVESTER unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the battle, each time a friendly TYRANIDS model makes an attack that targets the enemy unit that just destroyed your HARVESTER unit, add 1 to the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.targetBody: One GREY KNIGHTS PSYKER unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6" as if it were your Movement phase or, if it has the Deep Strike ability, it can be placed into Strategic Reserves.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEAGUES OF VOTANN INFANTRY or LEAGUES OF VOTANN MOUNTED unit from your army that was reduced to Below Half-strength as a result of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: The attacking unit gains 1 Judgement token, or up to 2 Judgement tokens instead if that LEAGUES OF VOTANN unit contained your WARLORD when it was targeted by those attacks.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One GENESTEALER CULTS MOUNTED or GENESTEALER CULTS VEHICLE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the LETHAL HITS ability while targeting an enemy unit within 18".

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One CULT MECHANICUS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, CULT MECHANICUS models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit that is more than 12" away, improve the Ballistic Skill and Armour Penetration characteristics of that attack by 1. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as a result of those attacks, select one of those destroyed models; that destroyed model's unit must take a Battle-shock test.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One PROSECUTORS unit from your army that has just shot.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next turn, while your unit is on the battlefield, that enemy unit is prosecuted. While a unit is prosecuted, each time an ANATHEMA PSYKANA model makes an attack against that unit, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1. While a PSYKER or Battle‑shocked unit is prosecuted, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that had one or more models destroyed as a result of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but it must target only the enemy unit that just attacked it, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Charge phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One WYCH CULT unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge even if it Fell Back or Advanced this turn.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that is arriving using the Deep Strike ability this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy models.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, Torrent weapons equipped by models in that unit have the DEVASTATING WOUNDS ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit has declared a charge.
stratagems.targetBody: One T'AU EMPIRE GRENADES unit from your army that was selected as one of the targets of that charge.
stratagems.effectBody: That enemy unit must immediately take a Battle-shock test, and until the end of the phase, subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for that enemy unit.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You cannot target a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Charge phase, just after a BEAST SNAGGA MOUNTED unit from your army ends a Charge move.
stratagems.targetBody: That BEAST SNAGGA unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit and roll one D6 for each model in your unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds). If that enemy unit is your Prey, roll three additional D6.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase, just after a KROOT unit from your army Falls Back.
stratagems.targetBody: That KROOT unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ORKS WALKER or GROTS VEHICLE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Each time you use this Stratagem, you can choose to push it. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re‑roll a Hit roll of 1. If you chose to push it, you can re‑roll the Hit roll instead and, until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the HAZARDOUS ability as well.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ACOLYTE HYBRIDS, HYBRID METAMORPHS or NEOPHYTE HYBRIDS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the ASSAULT ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your unit's ranged weapons (excluding Blast weapons) have the PISTOL ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One BOYZ unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase and is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit is selected to fight, when determining which models in your unit are eligible to fight, any models in your unit that are within 3" of one or more enemy models are eligible to fight. When resolving those attacks, such models can target one of those enemy units that is within 3" of them and within Engagement Range of their unit.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: Up to two TYRANIDS units from your army that are within Synapse Range of your army, or one other TYRANIDS unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one Hyper-adaptation. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Hyper-adaptation is active for those selected units in addition to any other that may be active for your army.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You cannot select the same Hyper-adaptation you selected at the start of the first battle round.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your unit is treated as containing fewer than five models for the purpose of the BLAST ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One CHAOS KNIGHTS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your model has the Feel No Pain 6+ ability, and the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against attacks made by Battle-shocked models.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEAGUES OF VOTANN unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One NECRONS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit within half range, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If a NECRONS CHARACTER is leading your unit, until the end of the phase, you can re-roll the Hit roll for that attack instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit that is Below Half-strength, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ORKS unit from your army (excluding GROTS, MONSTER and VEHICLE units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One NECRONS VEHICLE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

stratagems.whenBody: End of the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One DRUKHARI INFANTRY unit from your army that fought this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can make a Normal or Fall Back move, but unless it is a WYCHES unit, it must end that move wholly within 3" horizontally and 5” vertically of a friendly DRUKHARI TRANSPORT and must embark within that TRANSPORT at the end of that move.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit destroys a GENESTEALER CULTS CHARACTER model from your army.
stratagems.targetBody: That destroyed CHARACTER model. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: Roll one D6: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. If that CHARACTER model is an ABOMINANT or PATRIARCH, that enemy unit suffers 2D3 mortal wounds instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One THOUSAND SONS PSYKER unit from your army and one enemy unit that is visible to that unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly THOUSAND SONS PSYKER model makes an attack with a Psychic weapon that targets that enemy unit, that attack has the INDIRECT FIRE and IGNORES COVER abilities.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit is selected to Fall Back.
stratagems.targetBody: One NOBZ or MEGANOBZ unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
stratagems.effectBody: When that enemy unit Falls Back, all models in that enemy unit must take a Desperate Escape test. When doing so, if a Waaagh! is active for your unit, subtract 1 from each of those tests.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One DAMNED unit (excluding ACCURSED CULTISTS) from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: Add a new unit to your army identical to your destroyed unit, in Strategic Reserves, at its Starting Strength and with all of its wounds remaining.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle. This Stratagem cannot be used to return destroyed CHARACTER units to Attached units.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase, just after an enemy unit ends a move within 9" of one or more of your Cult Ambush markers, before removing those markers from the battlefield.
stratagems.targetBody: One PURESTRAIN GENESTEALERS unit from your army in Cult Ambush.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one of those Cult Ambush markers. You can move that Cult Ambush marker up to 6". If that marker is still within 9" of one or more enemy units, it is removed from the battlefield; otherwise, until the end of the battle, you can only select PURESTRAIN GENESTEALERS units from your army to be set up using that Cult Ambush marker.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One DEATH GUARD INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in this unit makes a Pile‐in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3".

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTA SORORITAS VEHICLE model from your army with the Deadly Demise ability that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: Do not roll one D6 to determine whether mortal wounds are inflicted by your model's Deadly Demise ability. Instead, mortal wounds are automatically inflicted.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One DEATHWATCH unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One RAVENWING MOUNTED unit from your army that is within range of an objective marker you control.
stratagems.effectBody: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASTRA MILITARUM and one GENESTEALER CULTS unit from your army that have not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one enemy unit that is visible to both of those selected units and within range of at least one ranged weapon from each of those units. Until the end of the phase, models in those units can only make attacks that target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target). When doing so, each time such a model makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after a CHAOS KNIGHTS unit from your army has fought.
stratagems.targetBody: That CHAOS KNIGHTS unit.
stratagems.effectBody: If one or more models were destroyed as a result of those attacks, your unit regains up to D3 lost wounds. If one or more models from Battle‑shocked units were destroyed as a result of those attacks, your unit regains up to D3+2 lost wounds instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Charge phase, just after a NOBZ or MEGANOBZ unit from your army ends a Charge move.
stratagems.targetBody: That NOBZ or MEGANOBZ unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit, then roll one D6 for each model in your unit that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit: for each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds). If a Waaagh! is active for your unit, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound for each 4+ instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase, just after a DRUKHARI INFANTRY unit from your army disembarks from a TRANSPORT that made a Normal move this phase.
stratagems.targetBody: That INFANTRY unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Charge phase, just after a TYRANIDS MONSTER model from your army ends a Charge move.
stratagems.targetBody: That TYRANIDS MONSTER model.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your model and roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit that is Battle-shocked and/or Below Half-strength, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit has declared a charge.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS INFANTRY unit from your army within range of your Acquisition objective marker that was selected as a target of that charge, and one friendly ADEPTUS MECHANICUS TRANSPORT.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can embark within that TRANSPORT.
stratagems.restrictionBody: Every model in your unit must be within 3" of that TRANSPORT and there must be sufficient transport capacity to embark the entire unit.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One DEATH GUARD INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit (excluding Blast weapons) have the PISTOL ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Charge phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One NECRONS unit from your army that was set up on the battlefield this turn using the Eternity Gate ability of a MONOLITH model that started the turn on the battlefield.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit is eligible to charge this phase.

stratagems.whenBody: Start of your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: Two T'AU EMPIRE units from your army that have not been selected to shoot this phase, and one enemy unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in either of your units makes an attack, it can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target for that attack), and when resolving that attack, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic by 1.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You cannot use this Stratagem during the fourth or fifth battle rounds.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One DAMNED unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the attacking unit has resolved all of its attacks, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, roll one D6: on a 6, the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound after all of its attacks have been resolved.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One PENITENT unit from your army that was just destroyed while it was within range of an objective marker you controlled. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Charge phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One DAMNED unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One BOYZ unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re‑roll a Wound roll of 1. If your unit contains 10 or more models, re‑roll the Wound roll instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One DRUKHARI unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack that targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You cannot target a HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army for this Stratagem.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One T'AU EMPIRE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One DEATH GUARD INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, re‐roll a Hit roll of 1. If that attack targets a unit within half range, you can re‐roll the Hit roll instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after a WORLD EATERS unit from your army destroys a CHARACTER or MONSTER model.
stratagems.targetBody: That WORLD EATERS unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Make a Blessings of Khorne roll and use the results to activate one Blessing of Khorne. Until the end of the battle round, that Blessing of Khorne is active in addition to any other Blessings of Khorne that are currently active.

stratagems.whenBody: Start of the Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army within range of an objective marker you control.
stratagems.effectBody: That objective marker is said to be Sabotaged, and remains under your control even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn. While an objective marker is Sabotaged and under your control, each time an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move within range of that objective marker, roll one D6: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One DESTROYER CULT or FLAYED ONES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase, just after your opponent's WARLORD is destroyed.
stratagems.targetBody: Your NECRONS WARLORD.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the battle, each time an enemy unit takes a Battle-shock or Leadership test, subtract 1 from the result.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One LYCHGUARD or TRIARCH unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the PRECISION ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One TITANIC model from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks and is within 18" of the attacking unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in the attacking unit have the HAZARDOUS ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One RAVENWING unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that had one or more of its models destroyed as a result of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", but it must end that move closer to the enemy unit that just shot. If the Abhor the Witch, Destroy the Witch vow is active for your army, your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6" instead, but it must end that move either closer to the enemy unit that just shot, or closer to the closest enemy PSYKER unit.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase, just after a CHAOS KNIGHTS unit from your army Advances or Falls Back.
stratagems.targetBody: That unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just before a TYRANIDS unit from your army Consolidates.
stratagems.targetBody: That TYRANIDS unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit Consolidates, models in it can move an additional 3" as long as your unit can end that move within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units. If your unit is within Synapse Range of your army and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, instead of making that Consolidation move, it can make a Normal move of up to 6".

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the LETHAL HITS ability. In addition, if one or more ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army are currently Battle-shocked, until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the ASSAULT, HEAVY and IGNORES COVER abilities.

stratagems.whenBody: End of your opponent's Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one enemy unit that Fell Back this turn and is within 6" of your unit. Your unit can declare a charge as if it were your Charge phase. When doing so, you can only select that enemy unit as the target of that charge (and only if it is an eligible target). Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One TECH-PRIEST model from your army and one objective marker within 24" of that model.
stratagems.effectBody: Roll one D6 for each enemy unit within range of that objective marker. On a 4+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound and must take a Battle-shock test.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ABHORRENT model from your army and up to three WAR DOG models from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the start of your next Command phase, those WAR DOG models count as being within range of any Aura abilities that ABHORRENT model has.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One NOBZ or MEGANOBZ unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not shot or fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 2 to the result if a Waaagh! is active for your unit. On a 5+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can shoot or fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after a TYRANIDS MONSTER model from your army with the Deadly Demise ability that cannot Fly is destroyed.
stratagems.targetBody: That TYRANIDS MONSTER model. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: Do not roll one D6 to determine whether mortal wounds are inflicted by your model's Deadly Demise ability. Instead, mortal wounds are automatically inflicted.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One DAMNED unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, enemy units are not considered to be within Engagement Range of your unit for the purposes of selecting targets of ranged weapons. Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy model loses a wound, while that model's unit is within Engagement Range of your unit, roll one D6: on a 4+, one model from your unit is destroyed after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll and, if your unit is Below Half-strength, you can re-roll the Wound roll as well.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One THOUSAND SONS PSYKER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, add 9" to the range of Psychic weapons equipped by your unit.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One BEAST SNAGGA unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the SUSTAINED HITS 1 ability. In addition, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack that targets your Prey, a Critical Hit is scored on an unmodified Hit roll of 5+, instead of only a 6.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the LETHAL HITS ability. If your unit is a HARVESTER unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit as well.

stratagems.whenBody: The start of your Shooting phase or the start of the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: Two or more WAR DOG units from your army and one enemy unit that is an eligible target for each of those selected WAR DOG units.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, the selected WAR DOG units can only target that enemy unit, but all weapons equipped by those WAR DOG models gain the SUSTAINED HITS 1 ability. In addition, if that enemy unit is Battle-shocked, until the end of the phase, each time a selected WAR DOG model makes an attack against that enemy unit, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

stratagems.whenBody: The start of your Shooting phase or the start of the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: Two or more ARMIGER models from your army and one enemy unit that is an eligible target for all of those ARMIGER models.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, when resolving attacks that target that enemy unit, improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of weapons equipped by those ARMIGER models by 1. If your army is Honoured, until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of those weapons as well.

stratagems.whenBody: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves. It will arrive back on the battlefield in the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase using the Deep Strike ability.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: Up to two KILL TEAM units from your army, or one other ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: For each unit targeted, select Furor Tactics, Malleus Tactics or Purgatus Tactics. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Mission Tactic is active for that unit instead of any Mission Tactic that is active for your army.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One NECRONS VEHICLE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

stratagems.whenBody: Start of your Charge phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to Charge rolls made for your unit for each other HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that made a Charge move this phase (to a maximum of +3).

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, CHARACTER models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1. If the Saga of the Beastslayer has been completed by your army, until the end of the phase, such weapons have the LANCE ability as well.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One RAVENWING unit from your army that has just shot.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one enemy unit that was hit by one or more of those attacks. That unit must take a Battle-shock test. When doing so, if one or more RAVENWING units from your army are within 6" of that enemy unit, subtract 1 from the test.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One SYNAPSE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has shot or fought.
stratagems.targetBody: One NECRONS INFANTRY unit from your army that had one or more of its models destroyed as a result of the attacking unit's attacks and one friendly MONOLITH model.
stratagems.effectBody: Remove your INFANTRY unit from the battlefield and then set it back up anywhere on the battlefield that is wholly within 6" of your MONOLITH model and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One T'AU EMPIRE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit within 9", improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You cannot use this Stratagem during the first or second battle rounds.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit within range of your Acquisition objective marker, add 1 to the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One TYRANIDS MONSTER unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR, BLADEGUARD VETERAN SQUAD, STERNGUARD VETERAN SQUAD or VANGUARD VETERAN SQUAD unit from your army within range of an objective marker you control.
stratagems.effectBody: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR, BLADEGUARD VETERAN SQUAD, STERNGUARD VETERAN SQUAD or VANGUARD VETERAN SQUAD unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.
