stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that has not declared a charge this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, you can re-roll Charge rolls made for your unit and melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the LANCE ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that is within Synapse Range of your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one Synaptic Imperative, even if you have already selected that imperative this battle. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Synaptic Imperative is active for your unit instead of any other Synaptic Imperative that is active for your army.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One THOUSAND SONS PSYKER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, all inferno bolt pistols, inferno boltguns, inferno combi-bolters and inferno combi-weapons equipped by models in your unit have the PSYCHIC ability and a Strength characteristic of 5.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army (excluding VEHICLE units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks. If that unit is BATTLELINE, you can also target one friendly SKITARII unit (excluding BATTLELINE units) within 6" of it.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets one of those units from your army, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One CULT MECHANICUS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a CULT MECHANICUS model in your unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One THOUSAND SONS PSYKER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase and is wholly within your army's Flow of Magic.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the IGNORES COVER ability. After your unit has shot this phase, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the phase, models in that unit cannot have the Benefit of Cover.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One HERETIC ASTARTES DAEMON VEHICLE unit from your army (excluding TITANIC units) that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, if your unit invokes its contract, each time it makes an attack that destroys an enemy model, roll one D6: on a 5+, your unit regains 1 lost wound after all of its attacks have been resolved (to a maximum of 6 wounds).

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ANATHEMA PSYKANA INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Stealth ability, and Battle‑shocked and PSYKER models can only select your unit as a target of a ranged attack if they are within 12".

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE unit from your army that was reduced to Below Half-strength as a result of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit that is Battle-shocked and/or Below Half-strength, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit destroys a GENESTEALER CULTS CHARACTER model from your army.
stratagems.targetBody: One other GENESTEALER CULTS CHARACTER model from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the battle, each time a friendly ACOLYTE HYBRIDS, HYBRID METAMORPHS or NEOPHYTE HYBRIDS model makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If the destroyed model was a MAGUS, PRIMUS or ACOLYTE ICONWARD, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One KROOT unit from your army that destroyed one or more enemy units this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: In your opponent's next Command phase, each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test. If the unit taking that test is Below Half-strength, subtract 1 from that test. Enemy units affected by this Stratagem do not need to take any other Battle-shock tests in the same phase.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks, and one friendly ADEPTUS MECHANICUS SMOKE unit within 6" of it.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, both of those units have the Stealth ability and the Benefit of Cover.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army (excluding DAMNED units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One DEATHWING unit from your army that is arriving using the Deep Strike ability this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy models.
stratagems.restrictionBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One THOUSAND SONS PSYKER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Stealth ability, and, if your unit is wholly within your army's Flow of Magic, each time an attack targets your unit, it has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One HERETIC ASTARTES TRANSPORT or HERETIC ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, if your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that is within Synapse Range of your army and made a Fall Back move this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge this turn.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASTRA MILITARUM OFFICER unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Your OFFICER can issue one Order as if it were your Command phase.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One DESTROYER CULT or FLAYED ONES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model from your unit makes an attack that targets a unit below Starting Strength, add 1 to the Hit roll. If the target is Below Half-strength, add 1 to the Wound roll as well

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if it is a KHORNE unit: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. That destroyed model can fight after the attacking model's unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit that is below its Starting Strength, you can re-roll the Hit roll. If the target is Below Half-strength, you can re-roll the Wound roll as well.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEGIO CYBERNETICA or ADEPTUS MECHANICUS VEHICLE unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the start of your next Command phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability, which is improved to Feel No Pain 5+ against mortal wounds.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re‑roll a Wound roll of 1, and, if it is a HALO OVERRIDE unit, re‑roll a Hit roll of 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ACOLYTE HYBRIDS, HYBRID METAMORPHS or NEOPHYTE HYBRIDS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, improve the Attacks and Weapon Skill characteristics of melee weapons equipped by models (excluding CHARACTERS) in your unit by 1 and those weapons have the HAZARDOUS ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.targetBody: One CANOPTEK unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as the result of any of those attacks, you gain 1 Miracle dice.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more attacks this phase and has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll, and if your unit is Below Half-strength you can re-roll the Wound roll as well.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase, just after an ASURYANI INFANTRY unit from your army (excluding AIRCRAFT, ASURMEN and WRAITH CONSTRUCT units) has shot.
stratagems.targetBody: That ASURYANI unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6+1".
stratagems.restrictionBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase, just after an ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army has shot.
stratagems.targetBody: That ASTRA MILITARUM unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the turn, that enemy unit cannot be targeted with the Fire Overwatch Stratagem and each time a GENESTEALER CULTS unit from your army selects that enemy unit as a target of a charge, you can re-roll the Charge roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, Torrent weapons equipped by models in your unit have the DEVASTATING WOUNDS ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One THOUSAND SONS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, all attacks made against your unit with Psychic weapons have the HAZARDOUS ability and all models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against Psychic Attacks.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS unit from your army or one IMPERIAL KNIGHTS CHARACTER unit from your army and one friendly ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit that is within 6" of that unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your units have the ASSAULT ability.

stratagems.whenBody: End of your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One MOB unit from your army that contains 10 or more models and is not Below Half‑strength.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one friendly Battle‑shocked ORKS INFANTRY unit within 6" of that Mob unit. That ORKS INFANTRY unit is no longer Battle‑shocked.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, subtracting 1 from the result if it is a DAMNED unit: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. That destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1. If the Suffer Not The Unclean to Live vow is active for your army, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of that attack as well.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One BEAST SNAGGA INFANTRY or BEAST SNAGGA MOUNTED unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a ranged attack targets your unit, models in your unit have the Benefit of Cover against that attack. In addition, if your unit has the Infantry keyword, until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Stealth ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase, before the Reinforcements step.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER model from your army that is not leading a unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one friendly unit (excluding Battle-shocked and Attached units) within 2" horizontally and 5" vertically of your model that it could lead (as described in the Leader section of its datasheet). Your model attaches to that unit as a Leader. Change that unit's Starting Strength accordingly.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One GREY KNIGHTS PSYKER unit from your army that is arriving using the Deep Strike or Teleport Assault abilities this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the start of your next Movement phase, your unit cannot be targeted by ranged attacks unless the attacking model is within 18".

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One MEK, ORKS WALKER or GROTS VEHICLE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Each time you use this Stratagem, you can choose to push it. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE, add 1 to the Wound roll. If you chose to push it, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of that attack and, until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the HAZARDOUS ability as well.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One T'AU EMPIRE BATTLESUIT unit from your army that is arriving using the Deep Strike ability this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy models.
stratagems.restrictionBody: A unit targeted with this Stratagem is not eligible to declare a charge in the same turn.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that is within 18" of one or more friendly ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER models, and that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll, and if the Pyromancy Discipline is active for your army, weapons that target your unit have the HAZARDOUS ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One GREY KNIGHTS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of that enemy unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army (excluding DAMNED units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a melee attack is allocated to your unit, after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, roll one D6 (to a maximum of six D6 per attacking unit): for each 4+, the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One GENESTEALER CULTS BATTLELINE unit from your army in Cult Ambush.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, when setting your unit up using a Cult Ambush marker, set your unit up anywhere on the battlefield wholly within 6" of that Cult Ambush marker and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Stealth ability. In addition, if your unit is a NURGLE unit, it can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18".

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ORKS WALKER or GROTS VEHICLE unit from your army (excluding TITANIC units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One GOLIATH ROCKGRINDER or GOLIATH TRUCK unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability. If your unit is within Synapse Range of your army, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One TYRANIDS MONSTER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the IGNORES COVER ability, and until the end of the phase each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that model's Ballistic Skill characteristic and any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

stratagems.whenBody: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: Up to two VANGUARD INVADER units from your army, or one TYRANIDS INFANTRY unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Remove the targeted units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves.
stratagems.restrictionBody: The targeted units must be more than 3" away from all enemy units.

stratagems.whenBody: End of the Reinforcements step of your opponent's Movement phase, if you have no Cult Ambush markers on the battlefield.
stratagems.targetBody: One ACOLYTE HYBRIDS, HYBRID METAMORPHS or NEOPHYTE HYBRIDS unit from your army in Cult Ambush.
stratagems.effectBody: This phase, you can set up your unit on the battlefield without using a Cult Ambush marker. When doing so, set up your unit anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy units, not within your opponent's deployment zone, and wholly within 9" of one or more battlefield edges.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army (excluding DAMNED units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit is set up or ends a Normal, Advance, or Fall Back move.
stratagems.targetBody: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS TITANIC unit from your army that is within 24" of and visible to that enemy unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one ranged weapon equipped by a model in your unit. That model can shoot at that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target). When doing so, that model can only make attacks with that weapon and each time it makes a ranged attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit, irrespective of the attacking weapon's Ballistic Skill or any modifiers.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One DEATHWATCH unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Select the Furor Tactics, Malleus Tactics or Purgatus Tactics. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Deathwatch Mission Tactic is active for your unit instead of any other Deathwatch Mission Tactic that is active for your army, even if you have already selected that Deathwatch Mission Tactic this battle.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One DEATHWATCH INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons (excluding Devastating Wounds weapons) equipped by models in your unit have the ANTI‐INFANTRY 2+ and ANTI‐MONSTER 5+ abilities.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You cannot select any units that have already been targeted with either the Kraken Rounds or Dragonfire Rounds Stratagems this phase.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ARBITES, INQUISITORIAL AGENTS or ORDO HERETICUS INFANTRY unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one enemy CHARACTER unit on the battlefield. Until the start of your next Command phase, each time a model in your unit targets that CHARACTER unit, its weapons have the PRECISION ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One DEATHWATCH INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the ASSAULT and IGNORES COVER abilities.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You cannot select any units that have already been targeted with either the Kraken Rounds or Hellfire Rounds Stratagems this phase.

stratagems.whenBody: Start of any phase (excluding the Command phase).
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ARBITES, INQUISITORIAL AGENTS or ORDO HERETICUS GRENADES unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS or VEHICLES) within 8" of and visible to your unit. That enemy unit must take a Battle‐shock test and, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ARBITES, INQUISITORIAL AGENTS or ORDO HERETICUS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the LETHAL HITS ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ARBITES, INQUISITORIAL AGENTS or ORDO HERETICUS INFANTRY unit from your army within range of an objective marker and that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ARBITES, INQUISITORIAL AGENTS or ORDO HERETICUS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit can target enemy units that are within Engagement Range of one or more friendly units with ranged weapons (excluding Blast weapons), provided the target is within 12".

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM unit from your army is destroyed as the result of an enemy unit's attacks.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ARBITES, INQUISITORIAL AGENTS or ORDO HERETICUS unit from your army that was within 6" of the destroyed unit (you cannot target the destroyed unit with the Stratagem).
stratagems.effectBody: After the attacking unit has shot, your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but when resolving those attacks it can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target).

stratagems.whenBody: Start of any Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One INQUISITOR, INQUISITORIAL AGENTS or ORDO MALLEUS unit from your army that is within range of an objective marker you control.
stratagems.effectBody: That objective marker is said to be Warded and remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn. While an objective marker is Warded and under your control, enemy DAEMON units cannot be set up on the battlefield within 6" of it.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One DEATHWATCH INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1 and improve the Range characteristic of those weapons by 6".
stratagems.restrictionBody: You cannot select any units that have already been targeted with either the Dragonfire Rounds or Hellfire Rounds Stratagems this phase.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One INQUISITOR, INQUISITORIAL AGENTS or ORDO MALLEUS unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one enemy DAEMON unit within 12" and visible to your unit. That unit must take a Battle‐shock test. If that test is failed, then until the end of the phase, each time a friendly AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM unit makes an attack that targets that DAEMON unit, that attack has the DEVASTATING WOUNDS ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase, just after a GREY KNIGHTS TERMINATOR SQUAD unit from your army Falls Back.
stratagems.targetBody: That GREY KNIGHTS TERMINATOR SQUAD unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One SKORPIUS DUNERIDER model from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, each time an ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit disembarks from that model after it has made a Normal move, that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ORDO MALLEUS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, all Psychic weapons equipped by models in the attacking unit have the HAZARDOUS ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One GREY KNIGHTS TERMINATOR SQUAD unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the LETHAL HITS and PSYCHIC abilities.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit within range of an objective marker, that attack has the SUSTAINED HITS 1, LANCE and IGNORES COVER abilities.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One VOIDFARERS CHARACTER unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM unit from your army that is arriving from Strategic Reserves this turn can be set up within your opponent's deployment zone (all other restrictions still apply).

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One VOIDFARERS unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets a unit within 12", improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM Attached unit that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack with the PRECISION ability is allocated to a CHARACTER model in your unit, if there are one or more Bodyguard models in your unit, roll one D6: on a 2+, that attack is allocated to a Bodyguard model of your choice in your unit instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One GREY KNIGHTS TERMINATOR SQUAD unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One GREY KNIGHTS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase and that is wholly within your army's Hallowed Ground.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re‑roll a Wound roll of 1, or, re‑roll the Wound roll instead if your unit is a PURIFIER SQUAD.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after a VANGUARD INVADER unit from your army has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: That VANGUARD INVADER unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one enemy unit that was selected as the target of one or more of your unit's attacks. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, add 1 to the Hit roll. If the Battle-shock test was failed, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One CANOPTEK unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18".

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM CHARACTER unit from your army (excluding OFFICIO ASSASSINORUM units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save and, after the attacking unit has resolved its attacks, unless your unit is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6" (when doing so, models in this unit move as if they have the FLY keyword).

stratagems.whenBody: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One INQUISTOR or DEATHWATCH INFANTRY unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Remove your unit from the battlefield. In the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase, set your unit up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Movement phase, when an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) is selected to Fall Back.
stratagems.targetBody: One HERETIC ASTARTES DAEMON VEHICLE or VASHTORR THE ARKIFANE unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) that is within Engagement Range of your unit Falls Back, all models in that enemy unit must take a Desperate Escape test. When doing so, if that enemy unit is Battle-shocked, subtract 1 from each of those tests.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One KROOT INFANTRY or KROOT HOUNDS unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: Add a new unit to your army identical to your destroyed unit, in Strategic Reserves, at its Starting Strength.
stratagems.restrictionBody: This Stratagem cannot be used to return destroyed CHARACTER units to Attached units. You can only use this Stratagem once per battle.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One VANGUARD INVADER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18" or, if your unit has the Lone Operative ability, if the attacking model is within 6". Your opponent can select new targets for the attacking unit's attacks.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One KROOT unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18".

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army has a mortal wound allocated to it.
stratagems.targetBody: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Select either the LANCE or LETHAL HITS abilities. Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected ability. You can instead choose for your unit to give in to the Red Thirst; if it does, then it becomes Battle‐shocked (but the effects of this Stratagem still apply to it) and until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the LANCE and LETHAL HITS abilities.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army has Advanced.
stratagems.targetBody: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to either shoot or declare a charge, even though it Advanced. You can instead choose for your unit to give in to the Red Thirst; if it does, it becomes Battle‐shocked (but the effects of this Stratagem still apply to it) and until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to both shoot and declare a charge, even though it Advanced.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army Falls Back.
stratagems.targetBody: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to either shoot or declare a charge even though it Fell Back. You can instead choose for your unit to give in to the Red Thirst; if it does, it becomes Battle‐shocked (but the effects of this Stratagem still apply to it) and until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to both shoot and declare a charge, even though it Fell Back.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One DEATH COMPANY unit from your army that was just destroyed while it was within range of an objective marker you controlled. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army makes a Fall Back move.
stratagems.targetBody: That ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back, and, if it is a HALO OVERRIDE unit, you can re‑roll Desperate Escape tests taken for it.

stratagems.whenBody: End of the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One PURIFIER SQUAD unit from your army that was eligible to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Roll one D6 for each enemy unit within 6" of your unit, adding 1 to the result if your unit includes CASTELLAN CROWE: on a 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: Add a new unit to your army identical to your destroyed unit, in Strategic Reserves, at its Starting Strength.
stratagems.restrictionBody: Any destroyed CHARACTER units that were attached to your unit are not returned. You can only use this Stratagem once per battle.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the battle, each time a friendly SANGUINARY GUARD unit makes an attack that targets the enemy unit that just destroyed your unit, you can re‐roll the Hit roll and you can re‐roll the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Start of the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES JUMP PACK unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy model within Engagement Range of your unit selects its targets, it must select your unit as the target of all of its attacks.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One DEATH COMPANY unit from your army, just before that unit Piles‐in.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile‐in move, it can move up to D3+3" instead of up to 3". If your unit is within 12" of one or more friendly CHAPLAIN models, or if it is below Starting Strength, it can move up to 6" instead. In either case, it can only do so provided your unit ends that Pile‐in move in Unit Coherency and within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

stratagems.whenBody: Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One GREY KNIGHTS INFANTRY unit (excluding TERMINATOR units) that is arriving using the Deep Strike or Teleport Assault abilities this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Set up your unit wholly within your army's Hallowed Ground and more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One DEATH COMPANY unit from your army that is below Starting Strength and has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, improve the Attacks, Stength and Armour Penetration characteristics of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1 and, unless your unit is within 12" of one or more friendly CHAPLAIN models, until the end of the phase, those weapons have the HAZARDOUS ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES JUMP PACK unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the LETHAL HITS and PRECISION abilities.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES JUMP PACK unit from your army Advances or Falls Back.
stratagems.targetBody: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES JUMP PACK unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES JUMP PACK unit from your army that is arriving using the Deep Strike ability this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy models.
stratagems.restrictionBody: A unit targeted by this Stratagem is not eligible to declare a charge in the same turn.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS INFANTRY unit (excluding KATAPHRON units) from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", or up to 6" instead if it is a HALO OVERRIDE unit.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that is within 18" of one or more ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER models from your army and has not been selected to Fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit, or add 2 if the Biomancy Discipline is active for your army.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: Up to two ADEPTUS CUSTODES INFANTRY units from your army, and one enemy unit that is an eligible target for all of those units.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your units can only target that enemy unit, but each time a model in one of your units makes a ranged attack, improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of that attack by 1.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You can only select two units if one (and only one) of them is an ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit and both are within 6" of each other.

stratagems.whenBody: Start of the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: Up to two ADEPTUS CUSTODES units from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in one of your units targets an enemy unit that is below its Starting Strength, add 1 to the Wound roll.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You can only select two units if one (and only one) of them is an ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit and both are within 6" of each other.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ANATHEMA PSYKANA INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks, and one other friendly ADEPTUS CUSTODES INFANTRY unit (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) within 6" of that ANATHEMA PSYKANA INFANTRY unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, any attack that targets your ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit must instead target your other ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit (unless it is not an eligible target).

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase, just after a mortal wound has been allocated to an ADEPTUS CUSTODES model from your army (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA models).
stratagems.targetBody: That ADEPTUS CUSTODES model's unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds.

stratagems.whenBody: Start of the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) that is below its Starting Strength.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit. If your unit is Below Half-strength, until the end of the phase, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of those melee weapons instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES BATTLELINE unit from your army (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) within range of an objective marker you control.
stratagems.effectBody: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Select either the LETHAL HITS or SUSTAINED HITS 1 ability. Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One VIGILATORS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack, you can re‑roll the Hit roll. If the target of that attack is Battle‑shocked or a PSYKER, you can re‑roll the Wound roll as well.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One WITCHSEEKERS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of Torrent weapons equipped by models in your unit. If such a weapon targets a PSYKER or Battle‑shocked unit this phase, add 2 to its Attacks characteristic instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER unit from your army that has just destroyed the unit you selected at the start of your Command phase as the target of your Assemblage of Might ability.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one enemy unit on the battlefield. Until the start of your next Command phase, each time an ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER model from your army makes an attack that target that enemy unit, add 1 to the Wound roll. In addition, if the destroyed unit was a CHARACTER unit, gain 1CP.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: Up to two ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER units from your army that have not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a CHARACTER model in either of your units makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, you can re‑roll the Hit roll and you can re‑roll the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight Phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER model from your army that was just destroyed and has not fought this phase. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: Do not remove your destroyed model from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.whenBody: End of your Shooting phase or the end of the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASURYANI MOUNTED unit from your army that destroyed one or more enemy units this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 7".

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTA SORORITAS TRANSPORT unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: One unit embarked within your TRANSPORT can disembark as if it were your Movement phase, and can then shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

stratagems.whenBody: Start of the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTA SORORITAS INFANTRY or ADEPTA SORORITAS WALKER unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy model within Engagement Range of your unit selects its targets, it must select your unit as the target of its attacks.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that had one or more of its models destroyed as a result of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but it must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One PENITENT unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a PENITENT model in your unit makes a melee attack, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the LETHAL HITS ability. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as the result of attacks made by those weapons this phase, select one of those destroyed models; that destroyed model's unit must take a Battle-shock test.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase, just before an ADEPTA SORORITAS TRANSPORT model from your army Advances.
stratagems.targetBody: That ADEPTA SORORITAS TRANSPORT model.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, you can re-roll Advance rolls made for your TRANSPORT, and units can disembark from your TRANSPORT even though it Advanced. Units that do so count as having made a Normal move, and cannot declare a charge this turn.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit within 6" that is also within range of an objective marker, add 1 to the Wound roll. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as the result of those attacks, select one of those destroyed models; that destroyed model's unit must take a Battle-shock test.

stratagems.whenBody: Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is blessed. While a unit is blessed, it can ignore any or all modifiers to the following: the profile characteristics of its models; the Weapon Skill or Ballistic Skill characteristics of weapons equipped by its models; any roll or test made for it (excluding modifiers to saving throws). If your unit has the JUMP PACK keyword, until the end of the turn, while a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit is within 3" of your unit, that friendly unit is also blessed.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTA SORORITAS CHARACTER unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: You can discard 1‐3 Miracle dice. At the end of the phase, set the last destroyed model from your unit back up on the battlefield, as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy models. Roll one D3, adding 1 to the result for each Miracle dice you discarded. That model is set back up with that number of wounds remaining (up to its starting number of wounds).
stratagems.restrictionBody: You cannot select SAINT CELESTINE as the target of this Stratagem. You cannot select the same CHARACTER as the target of this Stratagem more than once per battle.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One NECRONS VEHICLE or NECRONS MOUNTED unit (excluding TITANIC units) from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, if your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks, or one friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS JUMP PACK unit within 3" of such a unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. If you targeted an ADEPTA SORORITAS JUMP PACK unit from your army with this Stratagem, then until the end of the phase, while a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit is unit is within 3" of your unit, each time an attack targets that unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase. If that unit is BATTLELINE, you can also target one friendly SKITARII unit (excluding BATTLELINE units) within 6" of it.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in one of those units makes a ranged attack, if the target of that attack is within your opponent's deployment zone, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One SKITARII unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks. If that unit is BATTLELINE, you can also target one friendly SKITARII unit (excluding BATTLELINE units) within 6" of it.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, models in those units from your army have a 4+ invulnerable save.

stratagems.whenBody: The start of your Shooting phase or the start of the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: Two SKITARII units from your army that have not been selected to shoot or fight this phase, and one enemy unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of weapons equipped by models in both of your units by 1.
stratagems.restrictionBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in either of your units makes an attack, it can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target).

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One CULT MECHANICUS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a CULT MECHANICUS model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model's unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEGIO CYBERNETICA or ADEPTUS MECHANICUS VEHICLE unit from your army, and one objective marker.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the start of your next Command phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have a Ballistic Skill characteristic of 3+ and the IGNORES COVER ability, but they can only target units within range of the selected objective marker.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEGIO CYBERNETICA or ADEPTUS MECHANICUS VEHICLE unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back and you can ignore any or all modifiers to its characteristics and/or to any roll or test made for it (excluding modifiers to saving throws).

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase, just after a SQUADRON unit from your army Falls Back.
stratagems.targetBody: That SQUADRON unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

stratagems.whenBody: Start of your opponent's Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ABERRANTS, BIOPHAGUS or PURESTRAIN GENESTEALERS unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit within 9" of your unit is selected to shoot, it must take a Leadership test, subtracting 1 from the result. If that test is failed, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack that targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase, just after an enemy unit ends a move within 9" of one or more of your Cult Ambush markers.
stratagems.targetBody: One ATALAN JACKALS unit from your army in Cult Ambush.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one of those Cult Ambush markers. You can set up that Cult Ambush marker anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy units and wholly within 6" of one or more battlefield edges. Until the end of the battle, you can only select ATALAN JACKALS units from your army to set up using that Cult Ambush marker.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit declares a charge.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as a target of that charge.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", or up to 6" instead if it is a PHOBOS or SCOUT SQUAD unit.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR, BLADEGUARD VETERAN SQUAD, STERNGUARD VETERAN SQUAD or VANGUARD VETERAN SQUAD unit from your army that made a Charge move this turn and destroyed one or more enemy units this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: In your opponent's next Command phase, each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test. If the unit taking that test is Below Half-strength, subtract 1 from that test. Enemy units affected by this Stratagem do not need to take any other Battle-shock tests in the same phase.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One NECRONS VEHICLE or NECRONS MOUNTED unit (excluding TITANIC units) from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit can move horizontally through models and terrain features.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One HERETIC ASTARTES VEHICLE or VASHTORR THE ARKIFANE unit from your army that has not been selected to move or charge this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Normal, Advance or Charge move, it can move horizontally through terrain features as if they were not there.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.targetBody: One HERETIC ASTARTES VEHICLE or VASHTORR THE ARKIFANE unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6", but must end that move as close as possible to that enemy unit.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One T'AU EMPIRE BATTLESUIT unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit that contains 6 or more models, that attack has the SUSTAINED HITS 1 ability. If that attack targets an enemy unit that contains 11 or more models, it has the SUSTAINED HITS 2 ability instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One KROOT unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: After your unit has resolved its attacks this phase, select one enemy unit that was hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the phase, each time a KROOT model from your army makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, unless the attacking unit is Battle-shocked, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Start of your opponent's Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One GREY KNIGHTS INFANTRY unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit is set up or ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move within 6" of your unit, roll one D6, adding 2 to the result if your unit is wholly within your army's Hallowed Ground: on a 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

stratagems.whenBody: Reinforcements step of your Movement phase, from the second battle round onwards.
stratagems.targetBody: One HERETIC ASTARTES JUMP PACK unit from your army that is in Reserves.
stratagems.effectBody: Set your unit up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units, but until the end of the turn, it is not eligible to declare a charge. Then select one enemy INFANTRY or MOUNTED unit within 9" of and visible to your unit: that unit must take a Battle‐shock test.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit (excluding DAMNED units) from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: One destroyed model (excluding CHARACTER models) is returned to your unit. If your unit is a BATTLELINE unit, D3 destroyed models (excluding CHARACTER models) are returned to your unit instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Charge phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was just charged by an enemy unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Select either the Strength or Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit. Until the end of the turn, add 1 to the selected characteristic. You can instead choose for your unit to give in to the Red Thirst; if it does, it becomes Battle‐shocked (but the effects of this Stratagem still apply to it) and until the end of the turn, add 1 to the Strength and Attacks characteristics of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase, just after an ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army suffers a mortal wound.
stratagems.targetBody: That ADEPTA SORORITAS unit, or one friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS JUMP PACK unit within 3" of it.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds. If you targeted an ADEPTA SORORITAS JUMP PACK unit from your army with this Stratagem, then until the end of the phase, while a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit is unit is within 3" of your unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that destroyed one or more enemy units this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3", provided your unit ends that Consolidation move in Unit Coherency and within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units. In addition, if the Saga of Majesty has been completed by your army, each enemy unit within 6" of your unit when it ends that Consolidation move must take a Battle-shock test.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One DEATH COMPANY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if your unit is within 12" of one or more friendly CHAPLAIN models; on a 4+, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if the Uphold the Honour of the Emperor vow is active for your army. On a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking model's unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.whenBody: End of your opponent's turn.
stratagems.targetBody: Up to two LEGIONES DAEMONICA units from your army that are within your army's Shadow of Chaos, or one other LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Remove the targeted units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves. They will arrive back on the battlefield in the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase using the Deep Strike ability.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You cannot target units that are within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units with this Stratagem.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit that has one or more Judgement tokens has resolved its attacks.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEAGUES OF VOTANN unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Your LEAGUES OF VOTANN unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but it must target the enemy unit that just attacked it, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

stratagems.whenBody: End of your Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One NECRONS unit (excluding TITANIC units) from your army that is within range of one or more objective markers you control.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit's Reanimation Protocols activate.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after a DRUKHARI TRANSPORT from your army has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: That TRANSPORT.
stratagems.effectBody: After your TRANSPORT has fought, select one enemy unit that was the target of one or more of those attacks and roll one D6 for each model embarked within your TRANSPORT, adding 1 to the result if that embarked model is a WRACKS model: for each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One GREY KNIGHTS INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit that are wholly within your Hallowed Ground have a 4+ invulnerable save.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets the closest eligible target within 12", add 1 to the Hit roll. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as the result of any of those attacks, select one of those destroyed models; that destroyed model's unit must take a Battle-shock test.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks, and one friendly ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit within 6" of that ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against Psychic attacks and mortal wounds.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One SKITARII unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase. If that unit is BATTLELINE, you can also target one friendly Skitarii unit (excluding BATTLELINE units) within 6" of it.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time one of those units Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in that unit.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One BOYZ unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: After the attacking unit has shot, your unit can make a Go Get 'Em! move. To do so, roll one D6: each model in your unit can move a distance in inches up to the result, but your unit must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit. When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit. If your unit contains 10 or more models, you can re-roll the D6 to determine how far your unit can move.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Start of your opponent's Charge phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One GREY KNIGHTS INFANTRY unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit declares a charge and your unit is one of the targets of that charge, subtract 1 from the Charge roll, or subtract 2 instead if your unit is wholly within your army's Hallowed Ground.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER unit from your army that is eligible to shoot.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one enemy unit within 18" of and visible to one or more PSYKER models in your unit (excluding units with the Lone Operative ability), and roll six D6, adding 1 to each result if the Telekinesis Discipline is active for your army: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

stratagems.whenBody: Start of your Charge phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack that targets a CHARACTER unit, you can re‑roll the Wound roll. After your unit has fought, if one or more enemy CHARACTER models were destroyed as a result of those attacks, select one enemy unit within 6" of your unit. That enemy unit must take a Battle‑shock test. If the enemy WARLORD was destroyed as a result of those attacks, each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle‑shock test instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit (excluding DAMNED units) from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. Then select one augmentation (see Experimental Augmentations). Until the start of your next Command phase, models in your unit have the selected augmentation in addition to any other augmentations they have.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase and is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, when determining which models in your unit are eligible to fight, any models in it that are within 3" of one or more enemy models are eligible to fight. When resolving those attacks, such models can target one of those enemy units that is within 3" of them and within Engagement Range of their unit.

stratagems.whenBody: Start of the Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One AELDARI VEHICLE unit from your army that can FLY and is in Strategic Reserves.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Deep Strike ability. When your unit is set up on the battlefield using the Deep Strike ability, it can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units, but if it does, until the end of the turn, it is not eligible to declare a charge. In addition, if your unit is a TRANSPORT, each unit that disembarks from it this turn must be set up more than 6" horizontally from all enemy units and until the end of the turn, is not eligible to declare a charge.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One AELDARI VEHICLE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit is selected to shoot, you can re‑roll one Hit roll, one Wound roll and one Damage roll made for a model in your unit. If you are using fast dice rolling, you can select one of those rolls to re‑roll before moving onto the next step of the attack sequence.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Select the Chorus of Relentless Hate, Rite of Perfervid Wrath or Chant of Deathless Devotion Litany. Until the end of the battle round, that Litany is active for your unit instead of any other Litany that is active for your army.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One DRUKHARI or HARLEQUINS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if that unit is losing the wager: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. That destroyed model can fight after the attacking model's unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
