stratagems.targetBody: One DRUKHARI or HARLEQUINS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase, just after a DRUKHARI or HARLEQUINS unit from your army is selected to make a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, is set up on the battlefield, or declares a charge.
stratagems.targetBody: That unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, enemy units cannot use the Fire Overwatch Stratagem to shoot at your unit.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.targetBody: One DRUKHARI INFANTRY or HARLEQUINS INFANTRY unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6". If your unit is currently losing the wager, it can make a Normal move of up to 6" instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a CHARACTER unit, re‑roll a Wound roll of 1. If that attack is made by an OFFICIO ASSASSINORUM model and it targets the enemy WARLORD, you can re‑roll the Wound roll instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM CHARACTER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Toughness characteristic of models in your unit. In addition, if it is an EVERSOR ASSASSIN unit, until the end of the phase, it has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the SUSTAINED HITS 1 ability. In addition, if it is a CULEXUS ASSASSIN unit, until the end of the phase, change the Damage characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit to 3.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18", or, if your unit has the Lone Operative ability, if the attacking model is within 6".

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One DRUKHARI or HARLEQUINS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Select LETHAL HITS or SUSTAINED HITS 1. Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit has declared a charge.
stratagems.targetBody: One AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM GRENADES or VINDICARE ASSASSIN unit from your army that was selected as one of the targets of that charge and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, subtract 1 from Charge rolls made for that enemy unit, or, if your unit is a VINDICARE ASSASSIN, subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for that enemy unit instead.

stratagems.whenBody: End of your opponent's Charge phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM INFANTRY unit from your army that is within 6" of one or more enemy units and would be eligible to declare a charge against one or more of those enemy units.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can declare a charge. When doing so, you must select one or more of those enemy units as the targets of that charge, and your unit does not receive a Charge bonus this turn. In addition, if it is a CALLIDUS ASSASSIN unit and it makes a Charge move as a result of this Stratagem, until the end of the turn, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Wound roll

stratagems.whenBody: Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ORKS unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the start of the next Command phase, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in your unit.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ORKS INFANTRY or ORKS MOUNTED unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Select the SUSTAINED HITS 1 or LETHAL HITS ability. Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Charge phase, just after a STORMBOYZ unit from your army ends a Charge move.
stratagems.targetBody: That STORMBOYZ unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit, then roll one D6 for each model in your unit that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit Falls Back.
stratagems.targetBody: One ORKS unit from your army that was within Engagement Range of that enemy unit at the start of the phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

stratagems.whenBody: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One KOMMANDOS or STORMBOYZ unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effectBody: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed by a melee attack, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a move, it can move through terrain features.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE INFANTRY or LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE MOUNTED unit from your army (excluding units that Fell Back this turn) that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one enemy unit that is not within Engagement Range of one or more units from your army and is within 8" of and visible to your unit. Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Charge phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE unit from your army that has not been selected to charge this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit Falls Back.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE unit from your army that is within 6" of that enemy unit and would be eligible to declare a charge against that enemy unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only that enemy unit, and you resolve that charge. Note that even if that charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a Save characteristic of 3+.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase, just after an ORKS unit from your army Falls Back.
stratagems.targetBody: That ORKS unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH MONSTER unit from your army that is on the battlefield.
stratagems.effectBody: Select No Man's Land or your opponent's deployment zone, or spend one Flux token and select both. Until the end of the phase, the selected areas of the battlefield are within your army's Shadow of Chaos.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight that phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, add 2 to the Strength characteristic of weapons equipped by models in your unit, or spend one Flux token and add 3 to the Strength characteristic of those weapons and improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of those weapons by 1 instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody:
Roll one D6, then you can spend one Flux token to re‑roll the result: until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, on an unmodified Hit roll (after any re‑roll) of that result, the attack sequence ends, even if the original Hit roll would have been a Critical Hit.

Example: *If you roll a 2 and choose to spend one Flux token to re-roll the result, and the re-roll is a 6, then until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, on an unmodified Hit roll of 6 the attack sequence ends, that attack fails to hit and no Critical Hit effects (e.g. Lethal Hits) are resolved.*

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a move, it can move through terrain features.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, enemy units are not considered to be within Engagement Range of your unit for the purposes of selecting targets for, and resolving attacks with, ranged weapons. Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy model is destroyed while its unit is within Engagement Range of your unit, roll one D6: on a 5+, your unit suffers 1 mortal wound after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Stealth ability.

stratagems.whenBody: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units. Alternatively, you can spend one Flux token when you use this Stratagem and target up to two LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH units from your army instead (including those within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units).
stratagems.effectBody: Remove your units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA NURGLE unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA NURGLE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. After your unit has finished making its attacks, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks; that enemy unit must take a Battle‑shock test.

stratagems.whenBody: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effectBody: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA NURGLE unit from your army that is on the battlefield.
stratagems.effectBody: Return up to 1 destroyed model to your unit, or up to D3 destroyed models instead if your unit is a BATTLELINE unit, with their full wounds remaining. If it is a MONSTER unit, one model in your unit regains up to D3+1 lost wounds instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA NURGLE unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a move, it can move through terrain features.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA NURGLE INFANTRY unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Normal move, add 5" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Command phase, before selecting any targets for the Melancholic Miasma Detachment rule.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA NURGLE unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, after an enemy unit takes a Battle‑shock test as a result of the Melancholic Miasma Detachment rule, select one other enemy unit within 9" of your unit; that enemy unit must take a Battle‑shock test.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH MONSTER unit or up to two LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH units (excluding MONSTERS) from your army that have not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in one of those units makes an attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH MONSTER unit from your army that is on the battlefield.
stratagems.effectBody:
Each unit on the battlefield that is within your army's Shadow of Chaos must take a Battle‑shock test, subtracting 1 from that test if they are Below Half‑strength.

Designer's Note: *This Stratagem forces all friendly and enemy units alike within your army's Shadow of Chaos to take a Battle‑shock test. This can allow a Chaos Daemons player to heal units from their army through the Daemonic Terror army rule, at the risk of causing some of their own units to become Battle‑shocked.*

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a move, it can move through terrain features.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Charge phase, just after a LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit from your army ends a Charge move.
stratagems.targetBody: That LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit, then roll one D6 for each model in your unit that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit, or roll six D6 instead if your unit is a MONSTER unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets
stratagems.targetBody: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One KHORNE BERZERKERS or JAKHALS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase and is within 8" of one or more friendly WORLD EATERS CHARACTER models.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of melee weapons equipped by non‑CHARACTER models in your unit by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: End of the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One T'AU EMPIRE unit from your army that was eligible to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: If your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6". Otherwise, your unit can make a Fall Back move. It cannot embark within a TRANSPORT at the end of this move if it disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One KROOT or VESPID STINGWINGS unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One T'AU EMPIRE unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Advanced. If it is a KROOT or VESPID STINGWINGS unit, until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced as well.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One T'AU EMPIRE unit from your army (excluding KROOT and VESPID STINGWINGS units) that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit. If your unit is wholly within 9" of one or more KROOT or VESPID STINGWINGS units from your army, add 2 to the Strength characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One T'AU EMPIRE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re‑roll a Wound roll of 1. If it is a KROOT or VESPID STINGWINGS unit, you can re‑roll the Wound roll instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One WORLD EATERS INFANTRY, WORLD EATERS MOUNTED or WORLD EATERS DAEMON PRINCE unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, you can re‑roll the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) is selected to Fall Back.
stratagems.targetBody: One WORLD EATERS INFANTRY or WORLD EATERS DAEMON PRINCE unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
stratagems.effectBody: When that enemy unit Falls Back, all models in that enemy unit must take a Desperate Escape test. When doing so, if your unit is a VESSEL OF WRATH unit, subtract 1 from each of those tests.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
stratagems.targetBody: One WORLD EATERS INFANTRY, WORLD EATERS MOUNTED or WORLD EATERS DAEMON PRINCE unit from your army that lost one or more wounds as a result of those attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can make a Blood Surge move. To do so, roll one D6: models in your unit move a number of inches up to the result, but your unit must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit (excluding AIRCRAFT). When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit. If your unit is a KHORNE BERZERKERS or VESSEL OF WRATH unit, you can re‑roll the D6 to determine how far your unit can move.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One WORLD EATERS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll, or, if it is a VESSEL OF WRATH unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the LETHAL HITS ability. If your unit is a CHARACTER unit, until the end of the phase, those weapons have the LANCE ability as well.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the SUSTAINED HITS 1 ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES CHARACTER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18".

stratagems.whenBody: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES JUMP PACK unit from your army. You cannot target a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, unless it is THE SANGUINOR.
stratagems.effectBody: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase, just after a mortal wound is allocated to an ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army.
stratagems.targetBody: That ADEPTA SORORITAS unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability against mortal wounds. If your unit is Righteous, until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, improve the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1. If your unit is Righteous, until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1 as well.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile‑in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3". When doing so, if your unit is Righteous, it does not need to end that move closer to the closest enemy model, provided it ends that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody:
Select one non‑CHARACTER model in your unit. Until the start of your next Command phase, your model has the CHARACTER keyword.

Designer's Note: *While in effect, your model's unit is therefore a* CHARACTER *unit, meaning it can interact with the Legacy of the Angel Detachment rule, in addition to other rules that interact with* CHARACTER *units.*

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One KÂHL, ÛTHAR THE DESTINED or EINHYR HEARTHGUARD unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One CELESTIAN SACRESANTS unit that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. In addition, if your unit is Righteous, you can select one other CELESTIAN SACRESANTS unit from your army that is not Battle‑shocked and is within 6" of your unit. Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets that CELESTIAN SACRESANTS unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll as well.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army Falls Back.
stratagems.targetBody: That ADEPTA SORORITAS unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back. If your unit is Righteous, until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One GENESTEALER CULTS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit, re‑roll a Wound roll of 1. If one or more friendly TYRANIDS units are within 6" of that enemy unit, you can re‑roll the Wound roll instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Start of any phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One TYRANIDS unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the start of your next Command phase, increase the range of your unit's Catalyst ability by 3.
stratagems.restrictionBody: Each time you use this Stratagem, until the end of your next Command phase, you cannot use this Stratagem again.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Charge phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One GENESTEALER CULTS unit from your army that has not declared a charge this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of one or more TYRANIDS units from your army. Until the end of the phase, each time your GENESTEALER CULTS unit declares a charge, if that enemy unit is one of the targets of that charge, add 1 to Charge rolls made for your unit and you can re‑roll the Charge roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or your Charge phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One TYRANIDS unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

stratagems.whenBody: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One GENESTEALER CULTS or TYRANIDS unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effectBody: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has shot or fought.
stratagems.targetBody: One TYRANIDS CHARACTER unit from your army that was destroyed by that enemy unit this phase. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the battle, each time a GENESTEALER CULTS model from your army makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One KROOT or VESPID STINGWINGS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One KILL TEAM unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1 and improve the Range characteristic of those weapons by 6"
stratagems.restrictionBody: You cannot select any units that have already been targeted with either the Dragonfire Rounds or Hellfire Rounds Stratagems this phase

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody:
If your unit is a HALO OVERRIDE unit, it suffers D3 mortal wounds. Select one Override ability. Until the start of your next Command phase, that ability is active for your unit.

Designer's Note: *This means that if the targeted unit already has the* HALO OVERRIDE *keyword, it can be affected by multiple Override abilities at the same time, but suffers mortal wounds to do so. Alternatively, if your unit does not have the* HALO OVERRIDE *keyword, it instead has the chosen Override ability until the start of your next Command phase, but does not benefit from any other Override abilities that are active.*

stratagems.whenBody: End of your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES WALKER unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one objective marker you control that your unit is within range of. That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent's Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

stratagems.whenBody: End of the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One WORLD EATERS unit from your army that destroyed one or more enemy models with a melee attack this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one objective marker you control that your unit is within range of. That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent's Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle‑shock test, subtracting 1 from that test if that unit is Below Half‑strength.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if your unit has the WALKER keyword. On a 4+, do not remove it from play; The destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks (when doing so, it is assumed to have 1 wound remaining), and is then removed from play.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One CHAOS KNIGHTS unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the battle, the enemy unit that destroyed your unit is Marked. Each time a DAMNED model from your army makes an attack that targets a Marked unit, that attack has the LETHAL HITS ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the battle, the enemy unit that destroyed your unit is Marked. Each time an ADEPTUS MECHANICUS model from your army makes an attack that targets a Marked unit, that attack has the LETHAL HITS ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that is Righteous and that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Select either the LETHAL HITS or SUSTAINED HITS 1 ability. Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the PRECISION ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Select either the LETHAL HITS or SUSTAINED HITS 1 abilities. Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have that ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase, just after a mortal wound is allocated to an IMPERIAL KNIGHTS or ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army.
stratagems.targetBody: That IMPERIAL KNIGHTS or ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One EINHYR HEARTHGUARD unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons (excluding Blast weapons) equipped by models in your unit have the RAPID FIRE 1 ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit has declared a charge.
stratagems.targetBody: One AELDARI VEHICLE unit from your army that can FLY and was selected as a target of that charge.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for that enemy unit.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One KILL TEAM unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons (excluding Devastating Wounds weapons) equipped by models in your unit have the ANTI-INFANTRY 2+ and ANTI-MONSTER 5+ abilities.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You cannot select any units that have already been targeted with either the Kraken Rounds or Dragonfire Rounds Stratagems this phase.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One KILL TEAM unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the ASSAULT and IGNORES COVER abilities.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You cannot select any units that have already been targeted with either the Kraken Rounds or Hellfire Rounds Stratagems this phase.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEAGUES OF VOTANN unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile‑in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3".

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEAGUES OF VOTANN unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of that attack.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase, just after a LEAGUES OF VOTANN INFANTRY unit from your army Falls Back.
stratagems.targetBody: That LEAGUES OF VOTANN INFANTRY unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

stratagems.whenBody: The Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One LEAGUES OF VOTANN unit from your army that is in Reserves and has the Deep Strike ability.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, when your unit is set up on the battlefield using the Deep Strike ability, it can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units.
stratagems.restrictionBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One NECRONS unit (excluding TITANIC units) from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, if the target of that attack is within range of one or more objective markers, add 1 to the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One NECRONS VEHICLE or NECRONS MOUNTED unit (excluding TITANIC units) from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets a model in your unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of that unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
stratagems.targetBody: One NECRONS unit from your army (excluding TITANIC units) that was the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6".

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASURYANI MOUNTED or VYPER unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASURYANI MOUNTED or VYPER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One WRAITH CONSTRUCT unit from your army (excluding TITANIC units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One WRAITHBLADES, WRAITHLORD or WRAITHKNIGHT unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the DEVASTATING WOUNDS ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Start of your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One WRAITHBLADES or WRAITHGUARD unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one objective marker you control that your unit is within range of. That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent's Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Charge phase, just after a WRAITHBLADES, WRAITHLORD or WRAITHKNIGHT unit from your army ends a Charge move.
stratagems.targetBody: That WRAITHBLADES, WRAITHLORD or WRAITHKNIGHT unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit and roll one D6 for each WRAITHBLADES model in your unit, or roll four D6 if your unit has the WRAITHLORD keyword, or roll six D6 if your unit has the WRAITHKNIGHT keyword: for each 3+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One AELDARI PSYKER model from your army and one friendly WRAITH CONSTRUCT unit within 12" of it that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one enemy unit visible to your PSYKER model. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your WRAITH CONSTRUCT unit makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Armour Penetration and/or Damage characteristics of that attack.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASURYANI MOUNTED or VYPER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One WRAITHBLADES, WRAITHGUARD or WRAITHLORD unit from your army and one ASURYANI PSYKER model from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the start of your next Command phase, your WRAITHBLADES, WRAITHGUARD or WRAITHLORD unit is considered to be within 12" of your PSYKER model for the purposes of the Psychic Guidance and Spirit Guides abilities.

stratagems.whenBody: The Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASURYANI MOUNTED or VYPER unit from your army in Reserves.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, when setting up your unit on the battlefield from Reserves, it can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units. When doing so, if your unit is set up within 9" horizontally of one or more enemy units, until the end of the turn, it is not eligible to declare a charge.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One HARLEQUINS CHARACTER model from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: At the end of the phase, set your model back up on the battlefield as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with half of its starting number of wounds remaining.
stratagems.restrictionBody: Each model can only be targeted with this Stratagem once per battle.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One HARLEQUINS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6. On a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase, just after a HARLEQUINS unit from your army Falls Back.
stratagems.targetBody: That HARLEQUINS unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.targetBody: One TROUPE unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

stratagems.whenBody: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One HARLEQUINS unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effectBody: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASURYANI unit from your army (excluding WRAITH CONSTRUCT units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase, just after an ASURYANI unit from your army Falls Back.
stratagems.targetBody: That ASURYANI unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

stratagems.whenBody: End of the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASURYANI unit from your army and one friendly TRANSPORT it is able to embark within.
stratagems.effectBody: If your ASURYANI unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and is wholly within 6" of that TRANSPORT, it can embark within it.

stratagems.whenBody: End of your opponent's Charge phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One HARLEQUINS INFANTRY or HARLEQUINS MOUNTED unit from your army that is within 6" of one or more enemy units and would be eligible to declare a charge against one or more of those enemy units if it were your Charge phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit now declares a charge that only targets one or more of those enemy units, and you resolve that charge.
stratagems.restrictionBody: Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASURYANI unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the SUSTAINED HITS 1 ability while targeting an enemy unit within 12". If such a weapon already has that ability, until the end of the phase, each time an attack is made with that weapon, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

stratagems.whenBody: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One GUARDIANS unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: If your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, remove it from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves. When doing so, return every destroyed GUARDIANS model to your unit.

stratagems.whenBody: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASURYANI INFANTRY unit from your army that is wholly within 9" of one or more battlefield edges.
stratagems.effectBody: If your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, remove it from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One YNNARI unit from your army that was just destroyed while it was within range of one or more objective markers you controlled at the end of the previous phase. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one of those objective markers. That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent's Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One DIRE AVENGERS or GUARDIANS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit within range of one or more objective markers, you can re‑roll the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One DIRE AVENGERS or GUARDIANS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: If your unit is within range of one or more objective markers, until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One STORM GUARDIANS unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit. Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Dire AVENGERS or GUARDIANS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the PISTOL ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One YNNARI INFANTRY or YNNARI MOUNTED unit from your army (excluding WRAITH CONSTRUCT units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after a YNNARI INFANTRY unit from your army has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: That YNNARI INFANTRY unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re‑roll a Hit roll of 1. If your unit is below its Starting Strength, you can re‑roll the Hit roll instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One YNNARI unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.whenBody: End of your opponent's Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One YNNARI unit from your army (excluding WRAITH CONSTRUCT units), if one or more models in that unit were destroyed this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One YNNARI unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the LETHAL HITS and IGNORES COVER abilities

stratagems.whenBody: Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASURYANI PSYKER model from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one enemy unit within 18" of and visible to your model. That enemy unit must take a Battle‑shock test, subtracting 1 from that test.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASURYANI INFANTRY unit from your army (excluding WRAITH CONSTRUCT units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks and is within 9" of one or more friendly ASURYANI PSYKER models.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASURYANI INFANTRY unit from your army (excluding WRAITH CONSTRUCT units) that has not been selected to move this phase and is within 9" of one or more friendly ASURYANI PSYKER models.
stratagems.effectBody: Remove your unit from the battlefield and set it up again anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.
stratagems.restrictionBody: Until the end of the phase, your unit is not eligible to be selected to move.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASURYANI INFANTRY unit from your army (excluding WRAITH CONSTRUCT units) that has not been selected to shoot this phase and is within 9" of one or more friendly ASURYANI PSYKER models.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the IGNORES COVER ability and each time a model in your unit makes an attack, on a Critical Wound, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASURYANI PSYKER model from your army within 9" of that enemy unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Roll six D6: for each 3+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASURYANI INFANTRY unit from your army (excluding WRAITH CONSTRUCT units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks and is within 9" of one or more friendly ASURYANI PSYKER models.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18".

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASPECT WARRIORS or AVATAR OF KHAINE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Each time you use this Stratagem, you can remove one Aspect Shrine token your unit has (see datasheets). Then, until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if you removed an Aspect Shrine token during this usage of this Stratagem. On a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One AVATAR OF KHAINE model from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your model's Wailing Doom ranged weapon has a Range characteristic of 18" and a Damage characteristic of 8.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASPECT WARRIORS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Each time you use this Stratagem, you can remove one Aspect Shrine token your unit has (see datasheets). Then, select one of the following abilities, or select two of the following abilities if you removed an Aspect Shrine token during this usage of this Stratagem: IGNORES COVER, LETHAL HITS, SUSTAINED HITS 1. Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected abilities.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) is selected to Fall Back.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASPECT WARRIORS or AVATAR OF KHAINE unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
stratagems.effectBody: All models in that enemy unit must take a Desperate Escape test. When doing so, if that enemy unit is Battle‑shocked, subtract 1 from each of those tests.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase, just after a mortal wound is allocated to an AELDARI VEHICLE unit from your army.
stratagems.targetBody: That AELDARI VEHICLE unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One AELDARI TRANSPORT unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, units can disembark from your TRANSPORT after it has Advanced. Units that do so count as having made a Normal move that phase, and cannot declare a charge in the same turn, but can otherwise act normally.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: Two BOYZ units from your army that are within 6" of each other.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the start of your next Command phase, while those two units are within 6" of each other, they both count as containing 10 or more models for the purpose of your Detachment rule, any Enhancements models from your army have and any Stratagems you use.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASURYANI MOUNTED or VYPER unit from your army that was set up on the battlefield from Reserves this turn and has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re‑roll the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASPECT WARRIORS or AVATAR OF KHAINE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that attack's Ballistic Skill, Weapon skill, Strength, Armour Penetration and Damage characteristics and/or any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit destroys a DIRE AVENGERS or GUARDIANS unit from your army
stratagems.targetBody: One WAR WALKERS unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: After that enemy unit has finished making its attacks, your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but when resolving those attacks, it can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target).
stratagems.restrictionBody: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle round.

stratagems.whenBody: End of the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASURYANI unit from your army and one friendly TRANSPORT it is able to embark within.
stratagems.effectBody: If your ASURYANI unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and is wholly within 6" of that TRANSPORT, it can embark within it.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the PRECISION ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Start of any phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One REGIMENT unit from your army and one SQUADRON unit from your army within 6" of and visible to that REGIMENT unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, Orders affecting one of your units affect the other, and vice versa.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: Any number of ASTRA MILITARUM OFFICER units from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your OFFICERS can issue Orders to REGIMENT units and SQUADRON units.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One PLATOON unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, enemy units are not considered to be within Engagement Range of your unit for the purposes of selecting targets of ranged weapons. Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy model loses a wound, while that model's unit is within Engagement Range of your unit, roll one D6: on a 4+, one model from your unit is destroyed after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One WORLD EATERS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase and that made a charge move this turn.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASTRA MILITARUM VEHICLE unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a ranged attack is allocated to an INFANTRY model from your army, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of your VEHICLE, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, enemy units model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 2 to the result if it is a REGIMENT model. On a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASTRA MILITARUM CHARACTER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes an attack that targets a visible enemy unit within 12", you can re-roll the Hit roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One PLATOON unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit while targeting an enemy unit within half range.

stratagems.whenBody: Start of your opponent's Charge phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One PLATOON unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit ends a Charge move within Engagement Range of your unit, roll one D6 for each model in that enemy unit: for each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One INFANTRY OFFICER unit from your army embarked within a TRANSPORT. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it is embarked within a TRANSPORT.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your unit can issue Orders even though it is not on the battlefield, and it can issue Orders to ASTRA MILITARUM TRANSPORT units from your army (excluding TITANIC units) regardless of the distance to and from your unit's TRANSPORT.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Your INFANTRY unit can make a Normal move of up to D6".

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Start of your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One INFANTRY OFFICER model from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, when your model issues the Move! Move! Move! Order, it can issue that Order to any number of eligible friendly INFANTRY REGIMENT units, regardless of range to your model.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ALLARUS CUSTODIANS or AQUILON CUSTODIANS unit from your army that is on the battlefield.
stratagems.effectBody: That unit is split into separate units, each containing one model. These new units each have a Starting Strength of 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army Falls Back.
stratagems.targetBody: That ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.targetBody: One TRANSPORT unit from your army (excluding TITANIC units) that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, and is within 9" of the enemy unit that just ended that move.
stratagems.effectBody: Your TRANSPORT can make a Normal move of up to 6".

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Charge phase, after an enemy unit has selected targets for its charge but before it makes a Charge move.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as a target of that charge.
stratagems.effectBody: Provided your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and every model in your unit is within 3" of an ASTRA MILITARUM TRANSPORT from your army, it can embark within that TRANSPORT.

stratagems.whenBody: End of your opponent's turn.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Provided your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and every model in your unit is within 3" of an ASTRA MILITARUM TRANSPORT from your army, it can embark within that TRANSPORT.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One SQUADRON unit from your army that is Below Half-strength (excluding OFFICER units).
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the battle round, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit (excluding ONE SHOT weapons) have the HAZARDOUS ability, and each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that attack's Ballistic Skill characteristic and to the Hit roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase, just after a SQUADRON unit from your army Advances.
stratagems.targetBody: That SQUADRON unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Advanced.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASTRA MILITARUM VEHICLE unit from your army that has not been selected to move or charge this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Normal, Advance or Charge move, it can move horizontally through terrain features as if they were not there.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One SQUADRON unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit within 12", improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASTRA MILITARUM VEHICLE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.targetBody: One PLATOON unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit, and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

stratagems.whenBody: Start of your opponent's Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY or ASTRA MILITARUM MOUNTED unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Feel No Pain 6+ ability, and each time an enemy model makes an attack, if your unit is the closest eligible target, subtract 1 from the hit roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Start of your opponent's Charge phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASTRA MILITARUM GRENADES unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit selects your unit as the target of a charge, subtract 2 from the Charge roll (this is not cumulative with any other negative modifiers to that Charge roll).

stratagems.whenBody: End of your opponent's turn.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASTRA MILITARUM MOUNTED or ASTRA MILITARUM WALKER unit from your army that is wholly within 10" of one or more battlefield edges and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effectBody: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

stratagems.whenBody: Start of your opponent's Reinforcements step.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, enemy units that are set up on the battlefield as Reinforcements cannot be set up within 12" of your unit.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One INFANTRY REGIMENT unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: Add a new unit to your army identical to your destroyed unit, in Strategic Reserves, at its Starting Strength and with all of its wounds remaining.
stratagems.restrictionBody: This Stratagem cannot be used to return destroyed CHARACTER units to Attached units. You can only use this Stratagem once per battle.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One PLATOON unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the PRECISION ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit (excluding TITANIC units) from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Advanced.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase, just after an ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit from your army has shot.
stratagems.targetBody: That ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks that is visible to your unit. Until the end of the phase, that enemy unit cannot have the Benefit of Cover.

stratagems.whenBody: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One REGIMENT INFANTRY unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effectBody: Roll one D6 for each enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D6 mortal wounds. Then, your unit suffers 3D3 mortal wounds.

stratagems.whenBody: The Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit from your army that is in Reserves and has the Deep Strike ability.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, when your unit is set up on the battlefield using the Deep Strike ability, it can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units.
stratagems.restrictionBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

stratagems.whenBody: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, if all of its models have the Deep Strike ability, or one VALKYRIE unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effectBody: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES VEHICLE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets a model in your unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase, just after an ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER model from your army has used an ability on its datasheet that states it can only be used 'once per battle'.
stratagems.targetBody: That ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER model.
stratagems.effectBody: Your model can use that 'once per battle' ability one additional time during the battle (but not in the same phase).
stratagems.restrictionBody: You cannot use this Stratagem on the same ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER model more than once per battle.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 2 to the result if that model has the CHARACTER keyword. On a 4+, do not remove it from play; the destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks (when doing so, it is treated as having 1 wound remaining), and is then removed from play.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: Your DEATH GUARD WARLORD that is on the battlefield.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the start of your next Command phase, add 3" to the Contagion Range of models from your army.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
stratagems.targetBody: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army (excluding VEHICLE units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6".

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase, just after a SHADOW LEGION unit from your army is destroyed, before removing the last model in that unit from the battlefield and before rolling any dice for the Deadly Demise ability.
stratagems.targetBody: That SHADOW LEGION unit. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: Roll one D6 for each enemy unit that is within Engagement Range of the last model in your unit, adding 2 to the result if your unit has the SLAANESH keyword: on a 4-5, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6+, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ORKS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit, re‐roll a Wound roll of 1. If that enemy unit is within range of an objective marker, you can re‐roll the Wound roll instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One SHADOW LEGION unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the LANCE ability. If your unit has the KHORNE keyword, until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of those weapons by 1 as well.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ORKS WALKER unit (excluding KILLA KANS) from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the start of your next Command phase, improve your unit's Move, Leadership and Objective Control characteristics by 1, and each time a model in your unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One SHADOW LEGION unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: One model in your unit regains up to 3 lost wounds. In addition, If your unit has the TZEENTCH keyword, return up to one destroyed model (excluding CHARACTER models) to your unit with its full wounds remaining.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One ORKS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets the closest eligible target within 18", improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: Up to one SHADOW LEGION HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army and up to one SHADOW LEGION LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army. You can only select units that arrived from Reserves this turn.
